title: Is PES RR campus good for cs?
content:
I got 1753 rank in cet (obc, so hopefully I make the cutoff for cse).
I'm not able to decide between msrit and pes rr.
Can I get pros and cons for both??

comments.body: You can find a detailed list of pros and cons of PES (among other helpful links) on the FAQs: https://bit.ly/pesu-faq
Placements are really good here, you have good research opportunities. Amazing hackathons regularly. But academics is more hectic.
my rank was very very near to yours you could easily  get pes cse in 3rd round
I'm not sure if I wanna wait for the second extended round. Is there a possibility that I lose the other seats??
Are the placements better with RV CS(specialisation) or PES CS?
The advantage with RV is the competition is much lower as fewer number of students. So if you are willing to compete you can get really good offers here. Otherwise RV is better
